name: Timme Hosting
tag_list: nginx, hosting, seo, webhosting, managed-hosting, business-hosting, shop-hosting
overview:
Timme Hosting offers managed hosting packages based on the ultra-fast OpenSource web server nginx.

The company focuses on personal support. Each customer works together with an nginx specialist to get the most out of a web site. Because of this professional support, Timme Hosting takes care of all technical aspects, and customers can focus on their own businesses.

nginx delivers web sites up to 50% faster than the de-facto standard Apache. Since page speed is one of many SEO criteria, this can be an important factor for SEO if a web site is already highly optimized in other areas.

According to a W³Techs survey (http://w3techs.com/technologies/cross/web_server/ranking) nginx is used by 25% of the Top1,000 busiest sites of the world, including Facebook, Groupon, TechCrunch, etc.

According to Netcraft’s January web server survey (http://news.netcraft.com/archives/2012/01/03/january-2012-web-server-survey.html) nginx is now the second-most popular web server for all active web sites.
